languages.text:
Anyone within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a detonating mindscrambler grenade suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the targets also {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Все цели в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}области действия{/g} гранаты паралича разума получают +1 уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}.
Также они выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497} и в случае провала лишаются возможности атаковать.

traits.locale_text:
Anyone within the area of effect of a detonating mindscrambler grenade suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −<u>(4 × WIL bonus)</u> penalty, the targets also cannot attack.

languages.text:
Todas las criaturas en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de una granada ofuscadora sufren +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.
Si fallan una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}, los objetivos {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no pueden atacar{/g}.

Все цели в {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}области действия{/g} гранаты паралича разума получают +1 уровень эффекта {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательство{/g}.

languages.text:
思维扰乱手雷爆炸时，所有处于{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}目标区域{/g}的生物都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Anyone within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a detonating mindscrambler grenade suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
思维扰乱手雷爆炸时，所有处于{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}目标区域{/g}的生物都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受<u>（4×意志{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>减值。若目标未能通过检定，则无法攻击。

思维扰乱手雷爆炸时，所有处于{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}目标区域{/g}的生物都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若目标未能通过检定，则{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}。

languages.text:
精神錯乱グレネードの爆発の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内にいる者は{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}のスタックを+1負う。
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃することができず{/g}、−{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負う。
languages.original_text:
Anyone within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a detonating mindscrambler grenade suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −<u>(4 × WIL {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the targets also {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
精神錯乱グレネードの爆発の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内にいる者は{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}のスタックを+1負う。
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗すると、ターゲットは攻撃することができず、−<u>(4×WIL{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>のペナルティを負う。

精神錯乱グレネードの爆発の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内にいる者は{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}のスタックを+1負う。
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃することができず{/g}、−{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負う。

精神錯乱グレネードの爆発の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内にいる者は{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}のスタックを+1負う。
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗すると、ターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃することができず{/g}、−{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を負う。

languages.text:
Kreaturen im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} einer detonierenden Mindscrambler-Granate werden mit +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} belegt.
Misslingt eine Widerstands{g|Encyclopedia:Test}probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}, können Ziele {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}nicht angreifen{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Anyone within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a detonating mindscrambler grenade suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the targets also {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Jeder innerhalb des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Effektbereichs{/g} einer detonierenden Mindscrambler-Granate erleidet +1 Addition von {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.
Scheitert eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem Abzug von −<u>(4× WIL-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u>, können die Ziele auch nicht angreifen.

Jeder innerhalb des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereichs{/g} einer detonierenden Mindscrambler-Granate erleidet +1 Stapel von {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.
Scheitert eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-Widerstands-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}, können die Ziele auch {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}nicht angreifen{/g}.

languages.text:
Tout personnage présent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} d'une grenade déroutante subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} lorsque celle-ci explose.
En cas d'échec à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}, les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}ne peuvent pas non plus attaquer{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Anyone within the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a detonating mindscrambler grenade suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
On a failed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, the targets also {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Tout personnage présent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} d'une grenade déboussolante subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} lorsque celle-ci explose.
En cas d'échec à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec pénalité de -<u>(4 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de VOL)</u>, les cibles ne peuvent pas non plus attaquer.

Tout personnage présent dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} d'une grenade déboussolante subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} lorsque celle-ci explose.
En cas d'échec à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test de résistance{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} avec {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497}, les cibles {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}ne peuvent pas non plus attaquer{/g}.

languages.text:
Patlayan bir akıl karıştıran bombanın {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}etki alanı{/g} içinde olan herkes, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalır.
−{uip|DC|ad8833d6edf240dc9d1dd30fa2052497} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testini{/g} geçemeyen hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}saldıramaz{/g} hâle gelir.
